Containers.Description: Bridge Amazon Echo with your home automation controller for voice control of connected devices (tested with Vera, but should work with any HA device that accepts http commands)[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the configuration and library files will reside[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the unraid server IP in Advanced View[br][br] See the linked thread for setup instructions: http://forum.micasaverde.com/index.php/topic,31920.msg231970.html#msg231970[br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']Important[/span]: The new webUI makes it much easier to manage devices. By default, it runs on port 8080. If you really really really need to change it, you can add/modify SERVERPORT environment variable under advanced settings and set it to your choice of port, but if you do, you also have to modify the WebUI url. Read the post linked here for further instructions: https://lime-technology.com/forum/index.php?topic=39413.msg367707#msg367707[br]
